definitions.body: king of Jud., son of Joash, father of Azariah; [[אֲמַחְיׇהוּ]] 2Ki 14:1, 2Ki 14:9 + 8t. 2Ki 14; 2Ki 15:3, 1Ch 3:12; 2Ch 24:27, 2Ch 25:1 + 15 t. 2Ch 24; 2Ch 26:1, 2Ch 26:4; [[אֲמַחְיׇה]] 2Ki 12:22, 2Ki 13:12, 2Ki 14:8, 2Ki 15:1.
priest of Bethel, under Jerob. II, Am 7:10, Am 7:12, Am 7:14.
